section.name: 2.1.1 Java Versions
section.p: JMeter runs in JDK1.2 and higher. However, there is a rather nasty bug in JDK 1.3 that may affect your testing.

section.name: 2.1.5 JDBC Driver (for testing databases)
section.p: If you intend to perform database testing, you will need a JDBC driver.

section.name: 2.2.1 Downloading the Latest Release
section.p: We recommend that most users run the latest stable release instead of a nightly build.

section.name: 2.2.2 Downloading Nightly Builds
section.p: If you do not mind working with beta-quality software, then you can download and run the latest nightly build.
